item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Pigment Mixing into Digital Painting (83 points | 20 comments)
2. Little Snitch: Network Monitor and Application Firewall for macOS (23 points | 6 comments)
3. The Cody Computer (30 points | 2 comments)

5. The Zombocom Problem (53 points | 10 comments)
6. Is Iceland getting ready to join the EU? (166 points | 317 comments)
7. The last Inca bridge master (48 points | 5 comments)
8. Apple Photos phones home on iOS 18 and macOS 15 (1164 points | 866 comments)

10. WebGL Fluid Simulation (354 points | 47 comments)
11. TWISTED: The dramatic history of twisted-pair Ethernet (27 points | 2 comments)
12. Show HN: Chorus, a Mac app that lets you chat a bunch of AIs at once (9 points | discuss)
13. 'No Problem' Word Processor Poses a Problem for Former President Carter (1981) (36 points | 9 comments)
14. Are PC hardware companies driving technology into restricted closed ecosystems? (169 points | 113 comments)
15. I was wrong about the ethics crisis (196 points | 279 comments)
16. Belgium will ban sales of disposable e-cigarettes in a first for the EU (21 points | 19 comments)
17. Stripe V2 (54 points | 19 comments)
18. The Anatomy of a Large-Scale Hypertextual Web Search Engine (1998) (3 points | discuss)
19. Trying to use Bluesky without getting burned again (118 points | 207 comments)
20. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (159 points | 16 comments)
21. Om Malik – The Story of Stent (29 points | discuss)
22. Melbourne Train Control System is running on a hardware emulated PDP11 (86 points | 17 comments)
23. Faster CI with Selective Testing (5 points | 2 comments)
24. I Run LLMs Locally (210 points | 133 comments)
25. Intel's $475M error: the silicon behind the Pentium division bug (335 points | 101 comments)
26. Breaking NATO Radio Encryption [video] (63 points | 15 comments)
27. BioTerrorism Will Save Your Life with the 4 Thieves Vinegar Collective [video] (139 points | 134 comments)
28. OpenAI's Board: 'To Succeed, All We Need Is Unimaginable Sums of Money' (108 points | 83 comments)
29. Where can you go in Europe by train in 8h? (610 points | 388 comments)
30. Toronto man creates tiny mobile homes to help unhoused people escape the cold (180 points | 136 comments)
